p: We used the Open Data Kit (ODK) platform on tablets to collect data, including sociodemographic information, weight, and history of travels. The same day, we drew venous blood (5 mL) in SST vacutainer tubes (Becton Dickinson, https:/www.bd.com), kept them at 2°C –8°C, and centrifuged (1,500–2,000 × g) within 12 h before aliquoting and storing at −80°C.
